name: Cloner (LLCoolMage)
description:
ARROW KEYS - MOVE

D - CREATE CLONE

R - CLEAR THE BODIES

My game jame entry for MAKE-A-LEVEL LEAP DAY (February 2020) JAM. Incongrous is how I would describe piles and piles of myself trapped in a lab/warehouse.

Extremly rushed and sloppy but the idea is there, you repeatedly have to kill your clones in order to progress. Walk and jump over/on your corpses to escape!

HINT: You can create a clone pretty much anywhere...

Credits:

Tileset from here: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset 

Sound effects from here: https://harvey656.itch.io/8-bit-game-sound-effects-collection?download & https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack?download 

Thank you for making them and letting dweebs like me use them.

Everything else, like the music and the main sprite etc. Me.

Thanks for playing/taking a look.

Follow me @LLCoolMage
